bibl.title: Coins from the New York University Excavations on Geronisos (Cyprus), 1990-1997.
bibl.note: Reports on 13 Ptolemaic coins found during the excavations. The proportion of bronzes of Cleopatra VII and Ptolemy XVI Caesar is particularly high.
bibl.seg: Anne Destrooper, Coins from the New York University Excavations on Geronisos (Cyprus), 1990-1997.
Reports on 13 Ptolemaic coins found during the excavations. The proportion of bronzes of Cleopatra VII and Ptolemy XVI Caesar is particularly high.
